name: Alien Hunter
description:
You are an alien hunter, defend the Earth, the Moon and go to Mars to defeat them.

 

Keys:

Move: w,a,s,d or "arrow keys"

Fire: ctrl, z or "mouse left button"

Pause: esc

Mute music: M

Mute sounds: N

Powerups:

Life, recovers his health;

Ultra power, your weapon become stronger;

Turbo aura, his suit gains movement speed;

Armor Box, is a container that becomes a powerful armor, improving their strength and firepower. When destroyed their pieces are thrown causing damage to enemies around, and you come out unharmed.

#LOWREZJAM 2016
